original_text: Since they were spending many days there, Festus discussed Paul’s case with the king. He said: “There is a man here whom Felix left as a prisoner.
korean_text: 여러 날을 있더니 베스도가 바울의 일로 왕에게 고하여 이르되 벨릭스가 한 사람을 구류하여 두었는데

sentences.original_text: Since they were spending many days there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그곳에서 여러 날을 보내고 있었으므로

sentences.original_text: Festus discussed Paul's case with the king
whom Felix left as a prisoner
